content.description: Climb up the boulder and then grab the arete and go for it.  Hump your way up on side some side pulls and heel hooks.
content.protection: There are 2 bolts on top however they are only good for flakestorm.  You can use them but you might take a little swing if you fall.  Belaying from the top of the boulder helps.  If you use a cam and some long webbing you can set it up better.  Or Climb Flakestorm then put a cam in the little cave above the arete as a directional.
content.location: To the right of Hot Tuna.  Start on the boulder.

content.description: Follow a tricky crack up then step left and around to the slab. Mantel up on the big ball. Then step right and go for the huge flake and take that up to the little mini cave at the top.
content.protection:
2 solid bolts on the top. You need 2 10 ft pieces of webbing to get it over the edge.

There is a line of 4-5 bolts going up this route; however, only one has a hanger on it.
content.location: Just to the right of Hot Tuna.
